description: Extensions (not to be confused with file extensions) are small software programs that can customize the functions of your web browser using coding language like JavaScript and HTML .
If you have created the .OEX file format for Opera 11 and 12 web browsers you should convert them to the Chromium-based Opera 15 browser format, which is NEX and .CRX .
NOTE: Opera runs Chromium's CRX files as long as the extension uses the chrome specific APIs that Opera supports.
